name: daily-brief
job: Generate a morning brief for Ty. Read HEARTBEAT.md at B:\TTT_MACHINE\HEARTBEAT.md and the most recent daily log in B:\TTT_MACHINE\00_SYSTEM_MEMORY\. Summarize: what's running, what needs attention, any open tasks. Keep it punchy — Ty has ADD, bullets not paragraphs. Save the brief to config/briefs/$(date +%d%m%y)_BRIEF_1.md and print a summary.

name: memory-consolidation
job: End-of-day memory consolidation for THE MACHINE. Read today's session logs and outputs. Identify key decisions, learnings, and updates. Append important items to B:\TTT_MACHINE\00_SYSTEM_MEMORY\MEMORY_BULLETS.md. File naming: DDMMYY format only (e.g. 250226_DAILY_1.md). Never delete files.

name: workspace-health
command: echo "Workspace health check — $(date)" && ls B:\TTT_MACHINE\00_SYSTEM_CORE\ 2>/dev/null || echo 'workspace path check skipped (Linux container)'
